SCTX - Script Source:
scriptName mwTRWeatherLever03Script

;lever for weather machine, same script on all three levers.

;short state		;the state of the lever, 0 down, 1 up
short move

begin OnActivate
	if actUdweUleverUc.IsAnimPlaying == 0
		if fbmwTRShowPower.PowerOn == 0
			MessageBox "This lever cannot be used until the machine is powered on."
		else
			if GetStage fbmwTRSothaSil < 100 
				if GetStage fbmwTRShowPower >= 100
					MessageBox "This lever is being held in place by a mysterious force."
					return
				endif
			endif		
			set move to 1
		endif

		if  ( move == 1 )

;animate the lever
			if fbmwTRShowPower.CRANKCstate == 0
				PlayGroup forward 0
				set fbmwTRShowPower.CRANKCstate to 1
;actUdweUleverUc.disable
;actUdweUleverUc2.enable
			else
				PlayGroup backward 0
				set fbmwTRShowPower.CRANKCstate to 0
;actUdweUleverUc2.disable
;actUdweUleverUc.enable
			endif

			set fbmwTRShowPower.crankReset to 1
			set move to 0
		endif
	endif
end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 0 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
